wavcoreinf 0.0.0.9000
  • Get started
  • Reference

Make Wavelet Arguments

wav_args.Rd

This function is used internally by other functions. There are specific methods for each wavelet-based signal estimation procedure: wav_args_wshr, wav_args_ebthr, wav_args_wthr.

wav_args(list)

Arguments

list

A list of wavelet arguments.

Value

data frame

See also

wav_args_wshr, wav_args_ebthr, wav_args_wthr

Examples

# wmtsa arguments for using with wmtsa package
wshr_wmtsa <- list(
  wavelet = c("haar", "d4", "d6", "d8", "s8"),
  n.level = 1:4,
  shrink.fun = c("hard", "soft", "mid"),
  thresh.fun = c("universal", "minimax", "adaptive"),
  xform = c("dwt", "modwt"),
  reflect = c(TRUE, FALSE)
)
wav_args(wshr_wmtsa)
#>     wavelet n.level shrink.fun thresh.fun xform reflect
